name: Boomi Flow Reporting
description: An application to process and store incoming reporting data from Boomi Flow

DATABASE_TYPE.description: The type of database where the data will be stored

DATABASE_URL.description: A JDBC URL to the database where the data will be stored. Leave blank if using the default Heroku Addon

DATABASE_USERNAME.description: The username to use when connecting to the database where the data will be stored. Leave blank if using the default Heroku Addon

DATABASE_PASSWORD.description: The password to use when connecting to the database where the data will be stored. Leave blank if using the default Heroku Addon
